subject: Marketing
title: Town Criers
description: A quick win: understand Town Criers.

hook.text: Before newspapers, the news came from a man yelling in the town square.

buildup.text: Town criers were hired by merchants and governments to announce products, laws, and events.

discovery.text: They were the first paid media. A trusted voice delivering a message to a gathered audience.

twist.text: Criers also shaped public opinion. Whoever paid the crier controlled the narrative.

climax.text: The concept lives on in influencer marketingâ€”a trusted voice, a paid message.

punchline.text: Influencers are just town criers with Wi-Fi.

quiz.question: What role did town criers serve in early advertising?
options: They were paid to announce products and messages to gathered crowds
They delivered physical mail to each household
They regulated which merchants could sell in markets
